Class Explorer

All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
WumpusExplorer
public class Explorer
extends Agent

The wumpus server's model of an explorer in the wumpus' world.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

hasArrow

private boolean hasArrow
Flag indicating whether this explorer has an arrow.

hasGold

private boolean hasGold
Flag indicating whether this explorer has a bar of gold. It's always initially false.
Constructor Detail

Explorer

public Explorer(java.lang.String name,
                int row,
                int column,
                int direction)
Creates a new explorer, given its name, original position and direction. The explorer initially has an arrow.
Parameters:
name - the name of this explorer.
row - the row of the cave this explorer will start.
column - the column of the cave this explorer will start.
direction - the initial direction of this explorer.
See Also:
Constants.UP, Constants.LEFT, Constants.DOWN, Constants.RIGHT

Explorer

public Explorer(java.lang.String name,
                int row,
                int column,
                int direction,
                boolean hasArrow)
Creates a new explorer, given its name, original position and direction and the indication whether he has an arrow or not.
Parameters:
name - the name of this explorer.
row - the row of the cave this explorer will start.
column - the column of the cave this explorer will start.
direction - the initial direction of this explorer.
hasArrow - indicates whether the explorer has an arrow.
See Also:
Constants.UP, Constants.LEFT, Constants.DOWN, Constants.RIGHT

public static Explorer fromXml(java.lang.String xml)
Auxiliary method used to create an instance of an Explorer from a XML string.
Parameters:
xml - the XML string representing an Explorer
Returns:
the Explorer represented by the given XML string.

getHasArrow

public boolean getHasArrow()
Checks whether this explorer has an arrow.
Returns:
true if this explorer has an arrow; false otherwise.

Checks whether this explorer has a bar of gold.
Returns:
true if this explorer has a bar of gold; false otherwise.

           throws NoArrowException
